title: Google Pixel 4 and Rode Wireless Go Compatibility?
content:
I recently purchased a Google Pixel 4. I’m running into some dead-ends with connecting my Rode WirelessGo microphone to record audio while shooting video.

I purchased the following two adaptors that should fix the connection problem. 

Google USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Adapter Pixel USB Type-C (For Pixel 4)

Kingtop 3.5mm Combo Audio Adapter Cable for New Version Laptop
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01I3A47I4/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o02_s04?ie=UTF8&psc=1

The phone says it recognizes the external microphone, yet it doesn’t record any audio when they are connected.

Any Suggestions? Are they just not compatible?
